source_objects.title: Industry
source_objects.description: Break into new industries from healthcare, to veterinary medicine or event planning.

items.title: How to Throw Events and Attract Corporate Sponsors

visible_instructors.name: Lloyd
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of EventPlanningMastery.com and Event Organizer
visible_instructors.title: Lloyd Ball

items.headline: 48 Industry Secrets that Make You More Money and Get More People to Your Events
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to get sponsors for everything
You'll learn how to host an amazing event on a shoestring budget
You'll learn how to get celebrities and influencers to show up

items.title: Centrifugal compressors : Principles, Operation and design
items.headline: A complete understanding of construction details and functioning of centrifugal compressors for successful operations
objectives_summary: Understand centrifugal compressors working principles for successful operations of your plant and piping system
Understand centrifugal compressors construction details (impeller, volute, shaft, inlet guide vane, bearings, mechanical seals, etc)
Lear how to read and interpret your compressor curves

items.title: ePLAN Electric P8 Heavyweight Vol.1/2 - The Crash Course

visible_instructors.name: Ivan
visible_instructors.job_title: Applied Electrical Design Courses and Tutorials
visible_instructors.title: Ivan Vidovic

items.headline: Eplan Electric P8 Crash Course A-Z,  to get you going ASAP, while working on a real-life example of an automation system
objectives_summary: To get the most of Eplan Electric P8 by using it the proper way
To design a typical real-life example of an industrial automation project - cooling tunnel
To create a project, add pages, adjust project and page structures for your own need

items.title: Advanced Process Control & Safety Instrumented Systems SIS
items.headline: Learn how the main process equipment such as chemical reactors , pumps , compressors & heat exchangers are controlled
objectives_summary: Understand the importance of process control and how it is displayed on your P&IDs
Successfully interpret basic & advanced process control schemes
Understand the different process control options and how they are displayed on your P&IDs (cascade control, split range control, ratio control, batch control, selective control…)

items.title: Valves : Principles , Operation & Designs
items.headline: A complete understanding of construction details & functioning of valves for successful operation of your piping system
objectives_summary: Understand valves and control valves working principles for successful operation of your plant and piping systems
Understand valve construction details (bonnet, stem, disk, seat, packing, body, etc)
Know the characteristics and applications for each valve type (ball, plug, gate, pinch, butterfly, diaphragm, check, needle...)

items.title: The US Healthcare Industry: Changes and Opportunities
items.headline: An inside look at recent changes in the US healthcare industry brought on by Obamacare, and the pressure to lower costs
objectives_summary: Understand the key actors in the healthcare industry
Understand the key provisions of Obamacare
Understand how insurance companies are trying to lower costs

items.title: Good Clinical Practice (GCP)
items.headline: Key features of the GCP guideline, roles and responsibilities involved and the requirements of essential documentation.
objectives_summary: Understand the global standard, and key variations in specific countries (eg, China)
Learn when and where you want, with the flexibility of online learning
Learn more effectively with video lecture capture

items.title: Basics of Medical Terminology
items.headline: Medical terminology doesn't have to sound like a foreign language. Learn the basics on how to define these terms.
objectives_summary: Define key terms
Identify basic word elements
State the meaning of prefixes, suffixes, and word roots

items.title: EU Medical Device Regulatory Affairs explained Simply
items.headline: How to get approval to sell Medical Devices within the European Union. Understand regulatory affairs & ISO 13485 2016
objectives_summary: Understand how Medical Device Regulation works in the European Union.
Differentiate between a regulation and a directive.
Steps required to gain permission to manufacture and sell a medical device in the European Union.

items.title: Truck Dispatcher Training (STEP BY STEP, work independently)
items.headline: FULL COURSE- How to Become a Truck Dispatcher,  how to book loads for semi-trucks and  start your own Dispatch Company
objectives_summary: Types of trucks, their advantages and disadvantages.
Ensuring the safety of cargo during transportation
Necessary procedures for launching a truck business

items.title: Maintenance Planning Basics
items.headline: Understanding maintenance planning basics of successful maintenance department
objectives_summary: You will learn the basic tips of Maintenance Planning Basics and how to build a job plan of manage a shutdown
Job Plan Details
Job Plan's Information Sources

items.title: The Solar PV System Design Comprehensive Course //P1
items.headline: solar cells and panels and all about power generation, seasons, temp, sun path, azimuth, zenith, shadow, ... etc.
objectives_summary: Have a professional understanding of solar cell and solar panel datasheets
Compare between any datasheets very easily and take the right decisions whether to buy, use, or discuss with the manufacturer for more details
Conduct the necessary calculations in order to understand your panel performance more

items.title: Petroleum refining demystified - Oil & Gas industry
items.headline: Distillation Isomerization Alkylation Reforming Hydrofining Fluid Catalytic Cracking Asphalts Lubricating oils and more
objectives_summary: Comprehend the basic differences between exploration, refining and petrochemicals
Understand the basics of the various refining processes
Learn what crude oils are made of and understand the chemical properties of their hydrocarbon components like paraffins, naphthenes, aromatics...

items.title: Rise Of The Machines: Impact Of Automation On A Human World
items.headline: Be a smarter human; technology, robots, AI & automation are shaping the world, learn 4IR case studies and principles
objectives_summary: Introduction to topics like disruption, displacement, automation, autonomous vehicles and artificial intelligence
The future of work and why presidential hopeful Andrew Yang is deeply worried about automation
How technology impacted the Luddites, digital losers like Kodak, Gary Kasparov and Tilly Lockey

items.title: Oxford Diploma in Microeconomics/Business courses ( 43 hrs)
items.headline: Micro economics (Oxford Diploma) — Accredited; basic upwards (includes Business Microeconomics)
objectives_summary: Explain how to interpret elasticity
Using demand and supply, illustrate price determination
Examine the impact of tax/subsidies
